DOC.brief_summary: Background : - Parkinson disease ( PD ) affect half million Americans , cause slow movement , tremor , stiffness , trouble walk . Currently , symptom measure physical exam , unreliable require office visit . Researchers want study different way measure PD symptom , use home-testing machine call QMAT device . It test quickly someone move different task . Researchers study test compare physical exam test whether device detect change PD symptom time . Objectives : - To see home test device use evaluate Parkinson disease symptom . Eligibility : - Adults least 18 year old PD . Design : - Participants 22 clinic visit 5 year . Each visit take 3 hour . Visits schedule along visit another study . - At visit 1 , participant learn use QMAT device send test information clinic computer . The device computer screen , button , peg . Participants get device take home accessory . - Participants learn 2 QMAT test . For one , press key fast possible . For , move peg hole . The test take total 20 minute . - Participants take test home , 2 time day week , medication , . - A study coordinator monitor participant computer data discuss at-home test clinic visit .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Movement Disorders Using QMAT At-Home Testing Device
DOC.detailed_description: Objectives The purpose protocol improve understand pathophysiology movement disorder assess movement Parkinson disease perform small behavioral exercise objectively measure movement utilize QMAT home test device . These device provide Kinetics Foundation . We develop series motor task perform QMAT , home-based computer module , data patient movement collect frequently prospectively without obligate patient come medical center . The study design observational nature . The QMAT device implement respond interest objectify test monitor , analyze , understand physiological aspect Parkinson disease . We conduct : - Training patient perform task QMAT device transmit data home . - Training investigator prior experience use system - Testing use QMAT device may increase knowledge disease process , responsiveness treatment helpful patient progress evaluation analyze data collect home test . This protocol include non-invasive technique minimal risk participant . The technique pilot part 10-N-0009 protocol , Physiological Investigations Movement Disorders . Study Population We intend study patient diagnosis Parkinson Disease . We enroll 60 participant order obtain 48 patient complete study . Design We assign train study participant use QMAT device home . This portable device simple keyboard pegboard interface , store data patient performance home . There 2 task perform use device . The pegboard task involve transfer peg hole one side device opposite side device . The finger tap test digitography task involve subject press key keyboard . At enrollment study , time schedule discuss participant regard schedule home test require conduct . We provide device , component , data storage thumb-drive participant . Outcome measure i. Bradykinesia ( fine motor movement ) : The component apparatus test fine motor control involve finger pad tap alternate fashion patient 30 second . The primary outcome variable mean keystroke velocity ( complete alternate cycles/testing period , express cm/sec . Secondary outcome mean frequency express Hz , mean strike duration , express m/sec temporal variation duration finger strike frequency ( issue fatigue ) express coefficient variation ( SD/mean ) . Variation velocity express SD . ii . Complex movement : ( Pegboard plug device ) : The At-Home device also contain plug task . Primary outcome : mean movement velocity express second per plug cycle . This measure analyze statistically movement correct outlier response error . A secondary outcome also defatigation ( i.e. , linear change speed test session , express percent cycle-time . The variance speed provide standard deviation . A regression analysis allow estimate part variance declare linear change complete task .
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA Patients diagnosis Parkinson Disease Age 18 old Able give inform consent Ability comply schedule routine taking home test QMAT system responsibly ability perform QMAT test current plan enrollment 12N0137 : A Phase 1 Openlabel Dose Escalation Safety Study ConvectionEnhanced Delivery ( CED ) AdenoAssociated Virus Encoding Glial Cell LineDerived Neurotrophic Factor ( AAV2GDNF ) Subjects Advanced Parkinson Disease EXCLUSION CRITERIA Have 7 alcoholic drink week case woman 14 alcoholic drink week case man . Have brain tumor , stroke , head trauma , epilepsy , history seizure . Have major depression major mental disorder ( axis I disorder ) . Have neurologic disorder movement disorder Have head injury loss consciousness second .
